name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Rundll32
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts
query: (process.command_line:/.*\&\&.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]32\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]_[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Mm][Ss][Pp][Ee][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ee][Xx].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\&&* AND process.command_line:*rundll32* AND process.command_line:*shell32.dll* AND process.command_line:*shellexec_rundll* AND process.command_line:(*value* OR *invoke* OR *comspec* OR *iex*))`
